thread.title: Outstanding Hotel, Great Location, Nice Breakfast
thread.title_full: Outstanding Hotel, Great Location, Nice Breakfast - Review of Aloft London Excel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SteveJeanne50
title: Outstanding Hotel, Great Location, Nice Breakfast
text:
I absolutely loved this place. It was just outside the city center, about 15 minutes. The tube station was right outside the door. The breakfast was great, with outstanding variety. The staff was very friendly and professional. The pool and fitness center were great, and well taken care of. The room, though small, was well appointed and clean!
Green Features: The will give you a 5 pound certificate to use at their restaurant if you forgo the room cleaning for the day.
